dmca.title: Please help explain this to me better Brian 612-741-2688

> >Dear Fellow Webmasters,
> >I just wanted to let you folks know that there is an incredibly poor
> >quality website that is sending out spambots to gather our copyright
> >protected website content and source codes and placing it on their
> >website. They literally have hundreds of pages of stolen content
> >from other websites they are using to try and steal our traffic and
> >search engine results. Take a look at the following page of their
> >website and you you will find some of your website\'s content:
> >
>
>http://www.123-paintballs.com/corporate-events/corporate-event-planning
>-champaign.html
> >
> >I did some research and I found the following contact information
> >for this unreasonable webmaster and I have already been in contact
> >with him. I advise you all to do the same:
> >
